Funny, I knew that there are differences between uk and us, but I assumed this is a mistake even in UK :D
https://english.stackexchange.com/questions/459553/initialised-or-initialized-which-one-is-correct-spelling
In czech variant of this word is "s" variant obsoleted. I don't want to start any long discussion, but generally, should we prefer us or uk when we are EU-based?

probably we should be more consistent at least ...
